Package org.sakaiproject.taggable.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Link
    A link between an activity and a tagCriteria.
    LinkManager  
    Tag
    A tag from an activity to some object.
    TagColumn
    Represents a specific column in a TagList.
    TaggableActivity
    An activity that can be tagged.
    TaggableActivityProducer
    A service that produces activities that can be tagged.
    TaggableItem
    An object related to a tagged activity.
    TaggingHelperInfo
    An object that can provide the necessary data to interact with a specific helper tool.
    TaggingManager
    The TaggingManager provides access to available TaggableActivityProducers and TaggingProviders and the various activities and tags they provide.
    TaggingProvider
    A provider of tagging capabilities for services that produce taggable activities.
    TagList
    A specialized list that can provide column information in the form of a TagColumn for each field that the Tag objects in the list can provide.
